mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(sum( effective_order_num ),0) AS effective_order_num, IFNULL(sum( cancel_order_num ),0) AS cancel_order_num, IFNULL(sum( close_order_num ),0) AS close_order_num, IFNULL(sum( effective_order_total_amount ),0) AS effective_order_total_amount, IFNULL(sum( total_order_num ),0) AS total_order_num FROM stat_day WHERE id >= #{minId} AND id <= #{maxId}
